name: I'll Be Your Kitten (For A Price, Of Course)
name_original: I'll Be Your Kitten (For A Price, Of Course)
description:
I'll Be Your Kitten (For A Price, Of Course)

To pay off the money they owe for attending college, Bao has decided to work as... a kitten??? A rentable sugar-baby!!??

Your job is to help Bao play the part! Collect an army of supporters to make some money and buy special hobby items to get even more supporters!

Together, you and Bao will be able to pay a full four years of college; or more!!!

CONTROLS:
  • [LMB] to interact
  • [Q] to reset to start menu
  • [ECS] to quit game
  • [H] to open help menu
CREDITS:
  • Artist: Moss Nguyen (@Moss_Dude_ on twitter)
    Sound Design: Mateo Gudino (@_dragonk1ng on instagram)
